data.title: Catawba Valley Family Medicine - North Hickory
data.meta_description: Comprehensive health services in Hickory are offered at Catawba Valley Health System. We are invested in your long-term health goals.
data.text:
Dr. Steven Sanderson, Dr. Greg Brooks, Dr. Zuma Speakman, and Family Nurse Practitioner Boni Killian welcome you to their Family Medicine Practice. The top priority of the medical providers and their staff is helping you and your loved ones prevent illness and maintain physical and emotional well-being by providing medical care and recommending healthy lifestyle choices. We provide healthcare for men and women of all ages from newborns to great grandparents. Dr. Sanderson and Dr. Brooks manage acute and chronic illnesses, treat acute injuries, perform minor office surgeries and, when necessary, refer you to an appropriate specialist. Just think of your family medicine provider as your first line of defense in guarding your most valuable possession of all: your health.

SPECIAL SERVICES PROVIDED IN OUR OFFICE:

Wellness Programs

Geriatrics

Minor Surgeries (warts, toenail removal, skin biopsy, drainage of abscesses & skin cancer removal)

Adult & Well Child Physicals

Immunizations

Diabetes Care

Joint Injections

EKG (Electrocardiogram)

Infant/Pediatric Care

Pulse Oximetry

Spirometry

Women’s Health

Diagnostic ultrasound (Echocardiogram, vascular, abdominal vascular, abdomen & kidney and thyroid & soft tissue ultrasound)

NEW: Televisits for Boni Killian’s patients - Click Here

CVFM – North Hickory utilizes an Advanced Care Team model. Advanced Care team members support the Primary Care Provider in efforts to deliver effective patient centered care. ​

RN Health Navigator (RN): Suzanna, Kelly, Lindsay, Katrina, Carrie, Nou, Mai, Heather

Pulmonary Health Navigator (RT): Mandi

Administrative Care Coordinator: Karen S., Tamara, Tammy, Andrea, Karen R., May, Danielle

Quality Review/Audit Analyst: Ryan

Licensed Clinical Social Worker: Breanna

After-Hours Physician

To speak with a Catawba Valley Medical Group provider afterhours, please call: (828) 732-5350. This service provides direct access to the on-call provider, not a triage phone line, to increase access to care and is intended for medical questions or concerns. Please call 911 if you are experiencing a medical emergency.

Weekend After-Hours Care:

The convenience of extended office hours is provided by Catawba Valley Urgent Care - Maiden to all Catawba Valley Medical Group patients on Saturdays 9am – 1pm. Click here for more information.

Patient Portal:

Click here to access the Catawba Valley Medical Group Patient Portal where you will have the ability to access notifications, specific results, medical information and appointment details directly from your Healthcare Provider. Patients Age 13-17 will not have access to the Patient Portal effective 10/1/2022.

Electronic Patient Survey:

After your office visit, you will receive a Patient Satisfaction Survey via email. Please take time to complete the survey. We value your feedback.

Primary Care Patient Registration Packet

Primary Care Patient Registration Packet SPANISH

Online Appointment Scheduling

Book your Appointment (with participating Providers) Online:

If you are a new patient who has never been seen at this practice, do not use the online appointment option. New patients must call this clinic at (828) 732-5350 to set up an appointment.

Choose the "Book An Appointment" button below

Choose primary care provider

Select location

Select your provider name

Answer question: Have you seen this provider before?

Select your appointment time and enter patient and visit details

Complete the Phone Verification Process. To do this, you must enter a valid phone number in order to verify your appointment via text message or automated call back. Your appointment is not verified until you receive a text or automated call containing a verification code and have entered that code on your online form. Be sure to keep your appointment form open in your browser until you have entered this code. If you do not immediately receive a text or automated call or have any questions, call (828) 732-5350.

Click the orange "Book Now" button to complete the process of booking your appointment.

Ready to get started? Click the button below to book your appointment online.

Remember: if you are a new patient who has never been seen at this practice, do not use the online appointment option. New patients must call this clinic at (828) 732-5350 to set up an appointment.
